At Shaafi Hospital, we are committed to: Isbitaalka Shaafi, waxaan ugu talogalnay inaan bixino adeegyada caafimaadka ee ugu wanaagsan bulshada aan la nool nahay. Qof waliba oo soo galo albaabkeena wuxuu heli doonaa daryeel caafimaad oo sare
At Shaafi Hospital, your health and well: Isbitaalka Shaafi, wax waliba waxoo ka horumariyaa caafimaadkaaga iyo daryeelkaaga waana waxa ugu wanaagsan ee aan uqabano bulshadeena. Waxaad heli doontaa  daryeel caafimaad oo wanaagsan, iyo taageerid kuu gaar ah si aad uhesho nolol caafimaad leh.
Our hospital is renowned for its commitm: Isbitaalkeena waxa uu lagu yaqaanaa daryeel caafimaad oo heersare ah. Waxaanu leenahay dhakhaatiir khubaro ah iyo kalkaaliyayaal loo carbiyay daryeelka bukaanada kuwaasi oo si wadajir ah uga wada shaqeeya si loo hubiyo inuu bukaanka helay daryeelka caafimaadka ugu sareeya. Laga soo bilaabo baaritaannada joogtada ah ilaa qalliimo, waxa aan ku qalabeysan nahay in aan wax ka qabano xaalad kasta oo caafimaad.
We understand that visiting a hospital c: Waxaanu fahamsanahay in booqashada isbitaalku ay noqon karto daal. Taasi waa sababta ay shaqaalaheenu ugu heellan yihiin abuurista jawi diiran oo daryeel leh oo bukaanada dareemayaan in la ixtiraamayo, lana daryeelayo. Xirfadlayaasheena caafimaadka ma aha oo keliya khubaro, waxa kale oo ay yihiin shaqaale aad u naxariis badan, kuwaas oo ay ka go'antahay daryeelka bukaanka
We understand that the right infrastruct: Waxaannu fahamsannahay in qalabka saxda ahi ay door muhiim ah ka cayaarayaan bixinta daryeel caafimaad oo tayo sare leh. Taasi waa sababta aan ukeenay qalab caafimaad oo horumarsan si loo sameeyo baaritaan sax ah iyo daaweyn dhameystiran. Qalabkeena waxaa loo diyaariyay in bukaanadeena siiyo daryeel caafimaad
Shaafi Hospital offers a comprehensive r: Isbitaalka Shaafi wuxuu bixiyaa adeegyo caafimaad oo dhameystiran si wax looga qabto dhammaan baahiyahaaga caafimaadka. Hadaad u baahantahay daryeel deg deg ah, daaweyn takhasus ah, ama baaritaan caafimaad oo ka hortag ah, shaqaalaheena caafimaadka ayaa halkan jooga si ay u bixiyaan daryeel caafimaad oo dhameystiran. Waxaan mudnaanta siinaa  bukaanka si ay u sameeyaan go'aanno la xariira caafimaadkooda
As a community hospital, we actively eng: Isbitaalka Shaafi ahaan, waxaan si firfircoon ula shaqeynaa bulshada deegaankayaga iyada oo loo marayo barnaamijyo wacyigelin caafimaad, siminaaro waxbarasho, iyo dadaallo daryeelka kahortaga ah. Waxaan aaminsannahay in barnaamijyadaan ay sii kordhinayaan xiriirka soo jireenka ah ee bukaanadeena iyo in aan noqono saaxxibo ku kalsoon daryeelka caafimaadkooda.
At Shaafi Hospital, we offer a wide rang: Isbitaalka Shaafi wuxuu bixiyaa adeegyo kala duwan si waxa wax looga qabto dhammaan baahidaada caafimaad.Shaqaalaheena caafimaadka waxaa ka go'an in ee ku siiyaan daryeel caafimaad oo dhinac waliba leh

This page is still being developed and i: Boggaan waa laga shaqeynayaa, mardhaw ayuu diyaar noqonayaa
At Shaafi Hospital, we are proud to be a: Isbitaalka Shaafi, waxaan ku faraxsanahay inaan noqono hay'ad daryeel caafimaad oo hormuud u ah u adeegida bulshadeena adeegyo hufnaan, naxariis iyo daryeel heer sare.In ka badan 7 sano, isbitaalka Shaafi wuxuu u ahaay bixiyaha daryeelka caafimaadka iyo daryeelka bukaanada si ee uhelaan nolol caafimaad iyo farxad leh.
Our mission is to provide comprehensive,: Hadafkeenu waa in aan bixino adeegyo daryeel caafimaad oo dhamaystiran, oo bukaanka ka helayo daryeel sareeya, iyadoo la xoojinayo dhaqanka hal-abuurka, waxbarashada, iyo ka qayb qaadashada bulshada. Waxaan ku dadaalnaa in aan safka hore uga jirno horumarka caafimaadka, annagoo hubineyna in bukaannadeena ay helaan daaweynta iyo daryeelka ugu horumarsan ee la heli karo.
Excellence is at the heart of everything: Waxaan udiyaar sanahnay wax kasta in aan usameyno si heer sare ah. Waxaan si joogta ah u maalgelinaa shaqaalahayada caafimaadka, teknoolajiyada si loo hubiyo in aan joogteyno heerarka ugu sareeya ee bixinta daryeelka caafimaadka. Shaqaalaheena oo ka kooban dhakhaatiir xirfad sare leh, kalkaaliyeyaasha, farsamoyaqaannada, iyo shaqaalaha kale waxaa ka go'an inay bixiyaan daryeel caafimaad oo daboolaya baahida gaarka ah ee bukaan kasta.

Name: Magaca
Welcome to our Hospital's Story Page, wh: Ku soo dhawow Isbitaalkeena bogga 'Our Story', kaasi aan ku soo gudbino waxyaabaha noo qabsoomay
Our journey began with a simple yet prof: Socdaalkeennu wuxuu ku bilowday aragti qoto-fog oo fudud, si aannu bulshadeena ugu abuurno daryeel caafimaad. Waxa uu ku billowday isbitaal yar oo ka dib noqday isbitaal casri ah. Dhagax kasta oo la dhigay, iyo horumar kasta oo la gaadhay, taasu waxay markhaati u tahay ballanqaadkeenna ah in ee naga go'an tahay caafimaadkaada.
Over the years, we've embraced innovatio: Sanadihii la soo dhaafay, waxaan qaadanay hal-abuurnimo, waxaan sameynay iskaashi iyo horumarin caafimaad. Wanaageena waxa uu ku dhisan yahay daryeelka caafimaadka kuwaas oo si joogto ah ku dadaalaan in ay bixiyaan daryeel tayo sare leh. Laga soo bilaabo horumarinta caafimaadka iyo  daaweynta bukaanka, waxaan ku faraxsanahay in aan ku siino sida ugu fiican ee daawada casriga ah aan bixino.
Our story is interwoven with the rich ta: Sooyaalkeena horumarineed waxaa astaan u ah  bulshadeena. Waxaan rumaysan nahay in caafimaadkaada uu wax waliba ka horeeyo - Waxaan sameynaa barnaamijyada wacyigelinta, dadaallada caafimaadka bulshada lagu horumarinaayo, si aan u abuurno bulsho caafimaad qabta.
As we reflect on our past, we're excited: Markaan dib u milicsaneyno wixii ina soo maray, waxaan ku faraxsanahay mustaqbalka noo muuqda. Waxaan sii wadeenaa horumarinta caafimaadka bulshada, daaweynta saxda, iyo inaan sare u qaadno bukaanka daryeelkiisa. halkudhigeena waa  horumar caafimaad, hal-abuurnimo, iyo wax kasta oo sare uqaadayo caafimaadka bulshada. Waad ku mahadsan tahay in aad qayb ka sooyaalkeena. Waxaan rajeyneynaa inaan idinla wadaagno waxyaabo badan.
Leading the Way in Medical Excellence an: Ku hogaaminta bulshada daryeel caafimaad oo sax ah oo lagu kalsoon yahay
